name: Scotch
body:
#Malt List
A listing of the single malt scotches added to our family's _Infinity Bottle_.
***
**Year Added**
##2016
* Balvenie Doublewood 12yo
* Balvenie Caribbean Cask 14yo
* Aberfeldy 12yo
* Lagavulin 16yo
* Glenfarclas 12yo
* Kilchoman Machir Bay
* Laphroig Cask Strength 10yo
* Ardbeg Ugaedail
* Aberlour A'Bunadh
* Talisker 10yo
* Macallan 12yo
* Kilchoman Small Batch 5yo
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
